label: bike
caption: A rugged mountain trail winds its way through the rocky terrain, disappearing into a lush forest in the distance. A helmeted rider navigates his sleek bike with precision, the wheels kicking up small rocks as he takes a sharp turn onto a narrow ledge carved out of the stone face. The bright sun casts long shadows across the landscape as the rider pauses for a moment to take in the breathtaking view from the top of the mountain.
